input.job_description:
USMAN HANIF  
Usman.hanif9@gmail.com  
H# 878-C, Usama Block, Nishter Colony, Lahore . 
+923214580128  
https://www.linkedin.com/in/usman -hanif -53858460/  
 
OBJECTIVE  
“Pursuing a development oriented position where my skills, knowledge and abilities add meaningful value to the 
organization”   
EDUCATION  
Superior University, Lahore  
(2011 -2015)  Bachelors  in Business Administration  
 Major in Marketing  
Standard College, Lahore  
(2010 -2011)  F.Sc Pre-Engineering  
EXPERIENCE  
Siddiq Agricoze (Pvt). Limited  | Muridke Punjab, PK  
Business Development  Analyst  January 2022  – Present  
 Engaged and formed business relationship with the international clients in US and  EU etc. 
 Lead generation through international exhibitions and events.  
 Made the exhibitions visit plans and set up meetings with international potential distributors & 
clients.  
 Suggested to set up stand & display the products at international exhibitions.  
 Communication with existing customers and fulfill their business quires.  
 Analyzing the competition and devising the strategies accordingly.  
 Prepare the product samples and dispatch to the clients.  
 Devised the sales contract with agents/suppliers and cl osing the deals.  
 Coordination with all internal departments for smooth shipments and new clients acquisition.  
   
 Business Development Executive  February 2021 – December 2021  
 Developed the distribution network in all over the Pakistan.  
 Designed the sales contracts with distributors and sales targets.  
 Established B2B sales linkage and also provided sales support.   
 Designed the company profile and product broachers.  
 Write down the script of company profile video and executed the video shoot.  
o Link:  https:// www.youtube.com/watch?v=j8jxDOjX1Ww&t=5s  
 Devised the warehouse and logistics system of the company.  
 Provided sales forecasts on monthly/quarterly bases  to Board of Directors and Production Team.  
 Reported the sales performance on monthly bases to Board of D irectors.  
SRC Private Limited  | Lahore  Punjab, PK  
Business Development Officer  January 2018 – December 2021  
 Analysis of the market and suggest new projects/products for the growth of Company.  
 Conducted market research and explored the new market opportunities.  
 Studied the local & international market of Rice based ingredients  
o Demand/supply of Liquid Glucose.  
o Local and international competitors’ analysis.  
o Compiled the local and international po tential distributors/clients data base.  
o Identified the key challenges and market drivers.  
o Proposed Structure and Functions of a Sales & Marketing Department . 
o Proposed to board of directors to build rice based ingredients manufacturing company.  
o Board of di rectors approved the project and now company is selling product in local and 
international market.  
 Conducted market analysis of construction chemicals.  
o Proposed the Board of Directors to add Water Reducing Agent Chemicals in the 
products line.  
 Analyzed the Home Care FMCG products market which leads the company to introduce new 
Brand “Saaf & Safe” in Pakistan.  
Yorkshire Trading (Pvt). Limited | Lahore Punjab, PK  
Sales Officer  August 2016 – January 2018  
 Sales of Chipboard sheets, imported door panels, and  solid wood P roducts in the Punjab, 
Pakistan . 
 Preparation & execution of sales and marketing plan.  
 Potential customer lead generation and engagement.  
 Developed B2B sales channel (Haier, Chugtaiz, Torch Furniture, & Mohkam Furniture etc.)  
 Also developed retails sales channel in Punjab, Pakistan.  
 Introduced imported (Turkish) UV sheets in the Market.  
 Recovery  of payments  against sales.   
  Bank -related matters.  
SKILLS  
 
Management and Leadership Skills  
 
 Record Management  
 Multi -tasking  
 Capacity to work with peo ple from a wide range of cultural and socio -economic backgrounds  
 Building & Maintaining Good Professional Relationships  
Communication and Interpersonal Skills  
 Strong Experience of Managing Stakeholders and Partners  
 Email and Oﬃce Communication (taking notes, developing blueprints and report writing)  
 Social Skills (Adaptability, Negotiation and Persuasion)  
Digital Skills  
 Microsoft (Microsoft Excel, Microsoft PowerPoint, Microsoft Word, Microsoft Outlook)  
 Certified Candela RMS Operator  
 Social Media Management  
 
LANGUAGES KNOWN  
 
 Urdu   
 Punjabi   
 English  
 
BEYOND ACADEMICS  
 Social work  
 Tourism  
 Photography  
 Watching movies
input.additional_info: MarketPros Enterprises values diversity in hiring and encourages applications from seasoned business professionals with varied backgrounds. Preferred universities include Ivy League institutions and top business schools. We offer relocation benefits for exceptional candidates and facilitate remote working arrangements. Technical and strategic competencies are assessed through a mix of psychometric evaluations and case study interviews.
minimum_requirements: Proficiency in CRM tools like Salesforce or HubSpot
5+ years of experience in business development or sales management
Bachelor's degree in Business Administration or related field
Strong analytical and strategic planning skills
